attributes.action: Instigate a full Police investigation into the MPs Expenses abuses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government to instigate a full police investigation into MPs expenses abuses with a view to prosecute those who have committed offences of fraud, tax evasion and malfeasance in office. This is to include the expenses of MEPs and the House of Lords claims as well

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
